Reviews.Title: “A delightful ultra-luxury hotel in the heart of Madrid”
Reviews.Author: SnowBirdInParadise
Reviews.Content: located quiet charming street heart madrid beautiful romantic hotels europe moment arrive lobby surrounded elegance class plush tastefully decorated art vintage furnishings service attention detail staff expectationsthe hotel restaurant gourmet delight starters delightful watermelon foam appitizer smoked mussels sauce followed scrumptous consume main course venison husband grilled octopus dish perfectly prepared served elegant style expect world class hotel look forward return

Reviews.Content: trip advisor line helped inform choice hotel orfila booked five months advance stay located quiet neighborhood close plaza colon hotel sited short bus ride major museums shopping hotel elegant maintained staff accommodating restaurant recommendations reservations storing luggage visited ronda toledo days organizing taxis etc breakfasts delicious dinner final night hesitate recommend hotel charm elegance character convenience alert gracious staff

Reviews.Content: stayed night comfortable hotel centrally located city madrid comfortable quiet staff excellent prices expensive include breakfast id suggest taking breakfast nearby cafe

Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel orfila madrid apart location walking distance prado museums close wonderful shopping streets calle de serano spanish boutiques wonderful staff trouble booking tables moments notice translating spanish finding obscure shops told england remembering exactly party usually requested breakfast free dinner package food madrid recommend highly

Reviews.Content: spent five nights thiis relais 28 october november 2nd 2011 vacation discovery madrid travel worldwide jobs spend 100 nights differnt hotels orfila madrid revelation central location quiet street walking distance salamanca prado simplest 46 huge compared madrid furnished taste classical style expected relais functional amenities absolutely stunned tha absolute charming personalized service person staff attention invasive nor commercial genuinly friendly extremely professional orfila type business hotels charming cosy feel home thank orfila staff home madrid

Reviews.Title: “Update on my June 2011 Review”
Reviews.Author: Malcolm072
Reviews.Content: impersonal international chain hotels sticklers stayed 1st floor stay front desk manager jose suggested stay 4th floor directly floor wife reluctantly found time fourth stay past 12 months matrimonial bed call double bed plus incorrectly assumed twin beds available henceforth fourth floor regular home home madrid hospitality ambiance hotel orfila exceptional weather permitting try terrace meal drink morning coffee meals restaurant chef excellent table service impeccable expect relais chateaux look forward stay unfortunately mid 2012

Reviews.Title: “Old school charm in a very central location”
Reviews.Author: hungryperson
Reviews.Content: hotel orfila charming oldfashioned sort hotel location quiet embassy district madrid close shops prado thyssen museum etc lots nice touches theres breakfast 25 euros unless included rate lovely little terrace barrestaurant friendly welcoming free wifi throughout hotel helpful service attentive occasionally bit idiosyncratic example bottle champagne arrived couldnt persuade staff send ice actually drink romance package promised candles bath cheap romantic view getting information hotel restaurant reservation bit effort youd expect luxury hotel bit language issue suite spacious quiet comfortable agree commenters decor especially common bit refresh carpets wouldnt hurt overall nice stay lovely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Hotel you would like to stay in anywhere.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel orfila third time brought firend wife chicago usa impressed services accommodations hotel orfila hotel conveniently positioned access various tourist spots ie prado downtown subway stations bus services exemplary courteous restaurant serves finest spanish cuisines relais chateau chain anyway stay taste fine spanish flavor highly recommend hotel stay madrid
